00004 %> @mainpage ECTSimv2 Documentation
00005 %>
00006 %> @section intro Introduction
00007 %>
00008 %> The ECTSimv2 software (http://www.ectsim.ire.pw.edu.pl/) allows you to
00009 %> create model of capacitance tomography. See examples: ECT_big_model.m,
00010 %>                                                       ECT_small_model.m,
00011 %>                                                       test_model.m.
00012 %>
00013 %> @page installation Installation details
00014 %>
00015 %> ECTSimv2 Matlab version package contains:
00016 %> - folders with classes
00017 %> - examples:
00018 %>    ECT_big_model.m,
00019 %>    ECT_small_model.m,
00020 %>    test_model.m
00021 %> - csvd package (Copyright (c) 2008, Per Christian Hansen)
00022 %> - GUI (MATLAB's figures and m-files)
00023 %>
00024 %> Requirements:
00025 %> - MATLAB (ECTSimv2 was testing on MATALB r2010a)
00026 %> - You need to have Image Processing Toolbox
00027 %> - 3GB RAM recommended
00028 %>
00029 %> Installation:
00030 %> - download MATLAB version of ECTSimv2 from http://www.ectsim.ire.pw.edu.pl/
00031 %> - extract ECTSimv2 package to your work directory
00032 %> - add folder to MATLAB's path
00033 %> - run test_model.m
00034 %>
00035 %======================================================================
